data.text: @SenJohnKennedy Sanctions/pressures hurt the people, not the regime. An ideology that permits killing its own turns every sanction and negotiation into a tool for survival—while ordinary Iranians pay the price. @POTUS @WhiteHouse @IsraeliPM #R2PforIran #NoDealWithEvil

@SenJohnKennedy No pressure and negotiation work on this regime!
50,000 were killed for freedom.

#IranMassacre 
#IranRevolution2026 
#KingRezaPahlavi
@SenJohnKennedy Shriveled old cuck. I don’t like you anymore. The cia is responsible for Iran and its behavior. All of Congress need to a dirt napppypoo.

@SenJohnKennedy Act now instead of hand shaking with this brutal regime
#KingRezaPahlavi

@SenJohnKennedy Peace cannot be built on mass graves and prisons. Any agreement with this system is built on blood. Trump must take military action against the regime now. #KingRezaPahlavi #R2PforIran‌

@SenJohnKennedy From the Middle East to beyond, the Islamic regime’s proxies operate with one goal: expanding chaos. Talks do not stop this, they enable it. Terrorism on this scale requires military intervention. #FreeIran #RezaPahlavi
@SenJohnKennedy The Islamic regime survives by exporting terror and importing silence from the world. End both. No more excuses. No more cowardice. #KingRezaPahlavi #R2PforIran
@SenJohnKennedy There is no such thing as a ‘moderate’ inside this dictatorship. It is built on violence from top to bottom. #R2PforIran #IranMassacre
